Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Includes correctional facilities and local correctional facilities as publicly-assisted housing accommodations for purposes of the division of human rights
Summary: Includes correctional facilities and local correctional facilities as publicly-assisted housing accommodations for purposes of the division of human rights; defines correctional facilities and local correctional facilities.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to including correctional facilities and local correctional facilities as publicly-assisted housing accommodations for purposes of the division of human rights
